data.lyric:
[ti:Redman (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Redman (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：John Lamb/Durk Banks/Leonardo Soares Mateus/Malik Bynoe-Fisher
[00:00.47]Composed by：John Lamb/Durk Banks/Leonardo Soares Mateus/Malik Bynoe-Fisher
[00:00.71]Redman red van
[00:03.03]Ayo Bans what you cookin'
[00:04.34]Redman murder man
[00:06.96]Servin' bands outta Xans
[00:09.14]Ayy pull up Lam
[00:10.31]Man down oh oh
[00:11.44]I ain't get a chance to tell you I love you
[00:12.87]I'm tellin' you I love you now
[00:14.06]And you gotta ride with your gun every time you outside in the Chi'
[00:16.91]You ain't never had that feelin' in your stomach you gon' die
[00:19.96]Don't too many n***as send money to the jail so I try
[00:22.88]I know a n***a died with a name couple of his n***as still ain't slide
[00:25.97]All these n***as sayin' they gang they ain't even did s**t for the guys
[00:28.95]Same way that Pluto died we gon' do the same s**t to the Y
[00:31.84]Gotta eat b***h I trust one of my pants took some cash
[00:35.07]How you know a n***a from your hood
[00:36.51]Told you ain't try to put him on blast
[00:38.17]Man Terry died in his sleep off fake Percs I know mans
[00:41.10]They come around 'bout bodies gotta go blame n***as who dead
[00:43.92]Shhh
[00:44.08]That same day my cousin died I couldn't take no more meds
[00:47.07]They asked me where I'ma be in ten years s**t I said "The feds"
[00:50.09]They asked me what I'ma do 'bout Krump s**t he dead
[00:53.17]I went to the emergency room and I seen Pluto on that bed
[00:56.18]And they ain't gon' repeat that s**t I said "In my head dead man"
[01:00.83]Redman murder man
[01:03.75]Homicide red van
[01:06.78]Shots fired headband
[01:09.85]Man down man down
[01:12.61]Shots fired was a homicide yeah yeah
[01:15.40]Shots fired that's a homicide yeah yeah
[01:18.42]Shots fired that's a homicide yeah yeah
[01:21.41]Shots fired that's a homicide yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Redman (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]凶手 红色面包车
[00:03.03]Bans制作
[00:04.34]凶手 谋杀犯
[00:06.96]街头买卖 各种产品
[00:09.14]John Lam制作
[00:10.31]有人倒下
[00:11.44]我没有机会告诉你 我爱你
[00:12.87]我现在告诉你 我爱你
[00:14.06]你在芝加哥 出门在外 得随时带着枪
[00:16.91]你要是没有那种觉悟 你就会死的
[00:19.96]很多人都寄钱到监狱去 所以我也试了试
[00:22.88]我认识一个人就这样死去 他的有些兄弟还是没有出人头地
[00:25.97]这些人都说他们是匪帮的 结果根本就没有为兄弟们做过什么
[00:28.95]Pluto是怎样死的 我们会对Y做同样的事
[00:31.84]得吃饭啊 我相信的女人把手伸进我的裤兜 拿走了一些钱
[00:35.07]你怎么知道你的地盘上有人告密了
[00:36.51]你还不想把他给除掉吗
[00:38.17]朋友 Terry吃了假药 在睡梦中死去了 我知道有些人会这样
[00:41.10]他们犯下了一些事情 就把责任推在已死之人身上
[00:43.92]//
[00:44.08]我表弟死的那一天起 我就不能再吃那种药
[00:47.07]他们说我这十年在哪里 我说 在监狱
[00:50.09]他们问我要对Krump做什么 他已经死了
[00:53.17]我去急诊室 发现Pluto躺在床上
[00:56.18]他们不会重复我在脑海中说的话 都死掉了
[01:00.83]凶手 谋杀犯
[01:03.75]凶杀案 红色面包车
[01:06.78]子弹飞舞 戴着头巾
[01:09.85]有人倒下
[01:12.61]子弹飞舞 那是凶杀
[01:15.40]子弹飞舞 那是凶杀案
[01:18.42]子弹飞舞 那是凶杀案
